title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: I worked with the Operations Team of the School of Nursing. I was responsible for the development and maintenance of the School of Nursing's internal applications. Recently, I developed a new dashboard for the Office of the Dean that helps track course load and faculty availability.

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: I worked on a new feature that allows users to publish their songs and albums on the platform. I also worked on the development of a new feature that allows the fans to interact with the art and support the artists, hence giving them a chance to get discovered.

title: Software Engineer
description: I worked with the Machine Learning Team to rewrite a credit monitoring server in Python/Django, and create an automated system for data extraction and validation from financial statements, significantly increasing data throughput.

title: Software Engineer
description: I worked on the development of marketing and advertising algorithms leading to a 500+ increase in global downloads within three months, optimized internal scheduling algorithms for three local events to accommodate 800+ concurrent signups, and implemented Python scripts automating CI/CD processes, resulting in a 54% reduction in deployment time.
